text: The Football Association of Zambia (FAZ) is the governing body of football in Zambia. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1929. It became a member of CAF and FIFA in 1964. Category:1929 establishments Category:1920s establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in Zambia Zambia Category:Football in Zambia
title: Football Association of Zambia
